summary: Completed comprehensive testing of InFinea SaaS MVP. All core features working: registration, login, dashboard, AI suggestions, actions library, progress tracking, and payment integration. 15 micro-actions seeded successfully.

Actions library API returns all actions
AI suggestions endpoint working with GPT-5.2
Landing page loads with hero, features, pricing sections
Registration form functional with proper validation
Dashboard displays with time slider and energy selector
AI suggestions generate and display recommended actions
Navigation between pages (dashboard, actions, progress, profile) working
Protected routes properly redirect to login
Pricing page displays both free and premium plans (6.99â‚¬)

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (18/19 tests passed - minor selector timeout on one test)
